title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for the correct graph of y = x + sin x (increasing, through origin, cd - cu - cd - cu) shape of interest not extent

1 point is earned for the correct graph of y = x + 3 sin x (inc - dec - inc - dec - inc, through origin, cd - cu - cd - cu)
descriptions:
The student response earns none of the following points:

1 point is earned for the correct graph of y = x + sin x (increasing, through origin, cd - cu - cd - cu) shape of interest not extent

1 point is earned for the correct graph of y = x + 3 sin x (inc - dec - inc - dec - inc, through origin, cd - cu - cd - cu)

The student response earns one of the following points:

1 point is earned for the correct graph of y = x + sin x (increasing, through origin, cd - cu - cd - cu) shape of interest not extent

1 point is earned for the correct graph of y = x + 3 sin x (inc - dec - inc - dec - inc, through origin, cd - cu - cd - cu)

The student response earns all of the following points:

1 point is earned for the correct graph of y = x + sin x (increasing, through origin, cd - cu - cd - cu) shape of interest not extent

1 point is earned for the correct graph of y = x + 3 sin x (inc - dec - inc - dec - inc, through origin, cd - cu - cd - cu)

title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for the correct derivatives of x + b and x + b sin x

y′ = 1 = 1 + b cos x

b cos x = 0

cos x = 0

y = x + b = x + b sin x

b = b sin x

1 = sin x

1 point is earned for correctly setting the derivatives equal or checking candidates

1 point is earned for correctly setting y-values equal or checking candidates

1 point is earned for the correct answer from merged information

title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for the correct answer with reason

No, because f'(x) = 1 (or f'(x) ≠ 0) at x-coordinates of points of tangency
descriptions:
The student response earns none of the following points:

1 point is earned for the correct answer with reason

No, because f'(x) = 1 (or f'(x) ≠ 0) at x-coordinates of points of tangency

The student response earns all of the following points:

1 point is earned for the correct answer with reason

No, because f'(x) = 1 (or f'(x) ≠ 0) at x-coordinates of points of tangency

title: Part D
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for correctly setting second derivative equal to 0

f″(x) = −b sin x = 0

sin x = 0

1 point is earned for correctly showing f(x) = x

f(x) = x + b⋅ 0 = x

at x-coordinates of any inflection points

Note: 0/2 if specific value(s) for b
